name: Warpflux
description:
In Warpflux you assume the role of the only living officer aboard an autonomous colony ship. The destination? A new birthplace for humanity. Take command and decide the best course of action during the thousand-year long voyage full of perils.

Features
  • Defend against enemies during an intense, time-limited resource gathering phase
  • Carefully plan and manage a limited number of actions before entering cryo sleep
  • Collect research and use it to unlock new upgrades
  • Encounter crisis events and make tough decisions
  • Explore procedurally generated solar systems
